Test Firewall Rules with Rule Preview
To help customers on an Enterprise plan understand the potential impact of a new Firewall Rule, Cloudflare built
. With the click of a button, Rule Preview allows you to test a Firewall Rule against a sample of requests drawn from the last 72 hours of traffic. Rule Preview is built into the
panels so that you can test a rule as you edit it. For more information, refer to
